items.title: Nancy wants 'really happy' Maeda to stay at Celtic

items.title: Dozens of Flock AI camera feeds were just out there

items.title: 'Come on Pep!' - Dyche's response to Guardiola's weight demands
items.summary: Sean Dyche has told his Nottingham Forest players to "enjoy themselves" but "use common sense" over Christmas, after Pep Guardiola said Man City's players will be weighed when they return to training to check their fitness has not dropped over the festive period.
